entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
